titleStmt.title: VVhereas at the open generall quarter sessions of the publick peace holden for the city of London, at the Guildhall of the same city on Munday the three and twentieth day of Aprill, in the year of our Lord one thousand six hundred fifty and five; ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the Honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from opening lines of text.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
An order regulating prices and wages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
